section.title: Backup and Restore
section.para: This page allows you to back up the data for Helion CloudSystem appliances, restore from the backup file, and recover the Database appliance data.

listitem.para: Back up (full and incremental) the data (databases and files) for the trios of Helion CloudSystem appliances.
Restore from the backup file the data for the trios of Helion CloudSystem appliances.
Recover the Database appliance data after the restore.

important.para: Before you start your first backup, you must use the Attis CLI to specify where Helion CloudSystem will store backup files.
